check.name: CustomImportOrder
check.description: Contains matching attributes assisting in definition of "best matching" group for import. <EOF>

property.name: customImportOrderRules
property.description: Specify format of order declaration customizing by user.

property.name: standardPackageRegExp
property.description: Specify RegExp for STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE group imports.

property.name: thirdPartyPackageRegExp
property.description: Specify RegExp for THIRD_PARTY_PACKAGE group imports.

property.name: specialImportsRegExp
property.description: Specify RegExp for SPECIAL_IMPORTS group imports.

property.name: separateLineBetweenGroups
property.description: Force empty line separator between import groups.

property.name: sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically
property.description: Force grouping alphabetically, in ASCII sort order.
